item.title: In the garden of 17b Ainsworth Way, 19th August
item.description:
Unfortunately the silver birch in my garden appears to have dies - I'm a leaseholder on the estate but I believe this is a freeholder issue. I can't select the exact location on this map although the tree does exist on your 'Trees In Camden Map'.

item.title: Flytipping Household waste, 19th August
item.description:
Recently there has been repeated and persistent flytipping in the WilsonGrove end of Cranbourne Passage - SE16 4PF/J. This is such a shame as the passage is newly and beautifully planted. Currently, as the photos show, there are piles of black bags by one of the planters, next to and behind the green telephone cabinet and at the foot of one of the trees. It may be worth searching thro the bags for an address as whoever is responsible needs to be stopped!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wilson Grove, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime Bike Abandoned, 19th August
item.description:
Resident has called to report a Lime bike that has been abandoned. This was reported on the 8th August but there has been no action in removing this. Please can this be looked into as this is leaning up against the residents wall down the access road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sunray Avenue, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of litter on the path, 19th August
item.description:
The litter has been present since last week from the Warner Road bus stop with the shelter to Bromley Park. This is not helped by wheelie bins are being left on the pavement a week before the collection and don't have lids so loose litter is being thrown in there lose which then blows out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On wall Opposite 39 Exeter road, 19th August
